meanings.definition: A film or television show that takes the form of a documentary but presents fictional events.
meanings.sent1: I watched a hilarious mockumentary about aliens pretending to be humans.
meanings.sent2: The mockumentary was so well-made that some viewers believed the events were real.
meanings.sent3: The mockumentary about talking animals had me laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: The mockumentary on time travel cleverly blurred the line between reality and fiction.
meanings.sent5: The mockumentary on underwater creatures was both entertaining and informative.

meanings.sent1: The director decided to mockumentary the story of a superhero's daily life.
meanings.sent2: She loves to mockumentary funny situations to entertain her friends.
meanings.sent3: They mockumentaryed a cooking show with a twist - all the chefs were pets!
meanings.sent4: He mockumentaried the mundane office routine into a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: Mockumentarying the history of a fictional town became her passion project.
